      • log

        A common logger

      • stateDescriptor

        protected org.apache.flink.api.common.state.ValueStateDescriptor<Map<String,Stateful>> stateDescriptor
        Stores the window state. It contains a [key,value] map, where key is the keyed field(s) and value is the result computed for the current window

      • configuration

        protected IncrementalConfiguration configuration
        Contains parameters and configurations given by a user. See @see com.treelogic.proteus.flink.incops.config.IncrementalConfiguration for more information

      • updateWindow

        protected abstract void updateWindow(String field,
                                     List<DataSerie> dataSeries,
                                     Stateful status)
        When a window is filled, this method is automatically invoked.
        Parameters:
        field - Keyed field value(s)
        dataSeries - Lists of values for the keyed fields.
        status - Current state for each parameter

      • apply

        public void apply(org.apache.flink.api.java.tuple.Tuple key,
                  org.apache.flink.streaming.api.windowing.windows.GlobalWindow window,
                  Iterable<IN> input,
                  org.apache.flink.util.Collector<IncrementalWindowResult<?>> out)
           throws Exception
        This method is executed every time a window is filled. For more information, you can see WindowFunction.apply(Object, org.apache.flink.streaming.api.windowing.windows.Window, Iterable, Collector)
        Throws:
        Exception

        Apply operation, given a list of keyed values (KEY - VALUE) and a set of states to match with.
